welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nutley, the charming town known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious dining options. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Teterboro Airport is primarily used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights for airlines like Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines like United and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights for airlines like Alaska Airlines and Spirit.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
